Author: deeznutellaz
Text: Not the same thing but reminds me of how my mothers racist comments affected me even at age 4. I'd put sand on my face and body and would feel genuinely happy for finally becoming 'white' (im black). It's fucking sad how our issues start out earlier than we even imagined. Children as young as that shouldn't be thinking about weight, skin color, depression or any of that stuff. But sadly that's the world we live in.
